description: General Data Protection Regulation and Personal Data Protection Act

controls.title: Principles relating to processing
controls.description: Personal data shall be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner

controls.title: Lawfulness of processing
controls.description: Processing shall be lawful only if and to the extent that at least one legal basis applies

controls.title: Information to be provided
controls.description: Where personal data are collected, the controller shall provide the data subject with information

controls.title: Right of access
controls.description: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller confirmation as to whether personal data are being processed

controls.title: Right to erasure
controls.description: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller the erasure of personal data

controls.title: Data protection by design and by default
controls.description: The controller shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures

controls.title: Records of processing activities
controls.description: Each controller and processor shall maintain a record of processing activities

controls.title: Security of processing
controls.description: The controller and processor shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security

controls.title: Notification of a personal data breach
controls.description: In the case of a personal data breach, the controller shall notify the supervisory authority

controls.title: Communication of a personal data breach to the data subject
controls.description: When the breach is likely to result in a high risk, the controller shall communicate the breach to the data subject

controls.title: Data protection impact assessment
controls.description: Where processing is likely to result in high risk, prior to the processing, the controller shall carry out an assessment

controls.title: Designation of the data protection officer
controls.description: The controller and processor shall designate a data protection officer in certain cases
